text: Clux-Villeneuve is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Saône- et-Loire department in east France. It was created on 1 January 2015 from the former communes of Clux and La Villeneuve. Arrêté du 23 septembre 2014 portant création de la commune nouvelle de Clux-Villeneuve == References == Category:2015 establishments in France Category:Communes in Saône-et-Loire
title: Clux-Villeneuve
